channel.title: teams on AndyTheCoder
channel.description: Recent content in teams on AndyTheCoder

item.title: Curl a message to Microsoft Teams
item.description: TL;DR create a connector of type: ‘incoming webhook’ to the teams channel you want to post to and copy the generated url create a curl command view your teams message Create the connector (aka webhook) select the channel you want to create a connector for: add an ‘incoming webhook’: click add: name the connector (Note this name will appear in teams as the message sender)
